AribaWeb 5.2 API

The AribaWeb component-oriented server-side AJAX web development framework.

See:
          Description

aribaweb
ariba.ui.aribaweb.core The core component engine of AW.
ariba.ui.aribaweb.html AW Elements / Components that mirror standard HTML elements (Hyperlink, Form, Input elements), but with dynamically bindable attributes, values, and actions.
ariba.ui.aribaweb.test  
ariba.ui.aribaweb.util Utility / support classes for the AribaWeb core.
ariba.ui.servletadaptor Adaptor classes to marry aribaweb with the javax.servlet APIs.

 

widgets
ariba.ui.outline Controls for creating oulines (like a tree control).
ariba.ui.table Family of components for creating table (grid) controls (including scrolling flat tables, outline (grouped) tables, outline (tree) tables, and multi-dimensional pivot tables).
ariba.ui.validation Family of components for creating data entry forms.
ariba.ui.widgets Primary library of UI controls for AribaWeb, ranging from buttons, choosers, and popup menus, to tab controls, and portlet boxes, as well as full page wrappers.
ariba.ui.wizard.component  
ariba.ui.wizard.core  
ariba.ui.wizard.meta  

 

metaui
ariba.ui.meta.annotations Java source code annotations for providing meta data to metaui
ariba.ui.meta.core The core of the meta-data / rule driven UI engine.
ariba.ui.meta.editor  
ariba.ui.meta.jpa  
ariba.ui.meta.layouts Set of meta-data aware UI components for UI generation.
ariba.ui.meta.persistence Abstractions for binding meta UI into an ORM persistence framework.

 

util
ariba.util.core Utility classes
ariba.util.fieldvalue The core property access mechanism used by AribaWeb bindings and the Expr expression language.
ariba.util.formatter Formatter classes
ariba.util.i18n Internationalization Utility Classes.
ariba.util.io Input/Output Utility classes
ariba.util.log Logging Utility classes
ariba.util.shutdown  

 

expr
ariba.util.expr  
ariba.util.fieldtype
